title: Saiclopedia-Sai Temples Across The Globe
description: Like HIS life and times, Shirdi Sai Baba’s temples are full of mysteries and have an equal intriguing tales to relate. Laced with minute details about Sai temples, ‘Saiclopedia- Sai temples across the Globe’ is worth a collector’s gem. This is one-stop source of Sai Baba temples across the world. This e-book is full of information regarding the history of various Sai temples dotting the globe with timings, rituals, location and beautiful pictures of the temples to complement. Do you know who is claimed by many as Baba’s Guru? Which temple of Baba also has HIS tooth preserved? Which temple is known as Dakshin Shirdi? Find out the details in the book.This e-book is available on http://pothi.com/pothi/book/ebook-sha...http://www.lulu.com/shop/shama-rana/s...Have a happy reading!
author: Shama Rana
